pages.text: $(li)$(#B75724)$(l)Tier 1/$: Ships with no abilities at all.$(li)$(#4E4E4E)$(l)Tier 2/$: Ships with basic abilities.$(li)$(#CB9F28)$(l)Tier 3/$: Ships with stronger abilities.$(li)$(#A1A1A1)$(l)Tier 4/$: Ships with powerful abilities.$(li)$(#4A92C2)$(l)Tier 5/$: Ships with game changing abilities.
